item.title: Need Adobe Premiere Pro CC 2015 Video Editing Tutor - Upwork
item.description:
I need help with Adobe Premiere Pro CC 2015 on a PC. I have dabbled with FinalCutPro a decade ago and started working with Premiere Pro about 5 years ago. I only edit videos for personal projects and do it so infrequently that I forget how to do things.

When importing clips, I am having problems with importing both the audio and video clips together. My program is old and has trouble importing video clips so we have to convert them. I also get lost with where to find clips I've imported, adding titles, adding music, etc.

I am looking for someone who has patience and can help me make these videos. I am working on a train video, my grandson's first 3 months video, a wildfire egress route video, and more! I would like you to help me make these videos.

Are you interested? I am in Calif PST.


Posted On: June 25, 2024 00:49 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Data Entry, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Video Editing, VideoScribe, Video Post-Editing, Data Mining
Skills: Data Entry, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Video Editing, VideoScribe, Video Post-Editing, Data Mining
Country: USA
click to apply

item.title: Instagram Content Creator - Upwork
item.description:
We're looking for a talented local videographer to film occasional sessions of our artist working in their studio. The videos will be used to create awesome content for Instagram.

@danielzimmermanstudio on instagram to see the space

As the videographer, you'll be in charge of capturing high-quality videos that showcase the artist's creative process and unique style. The ideal candidate should have a great eye for detail and be able to work on their own. This is a fantastic opportunity to collaborate with a passionate artist and enhance your portfolio.
  Skills needed:
  - Good at filming and editing videos
  - Knowledge of lighting techniques
  - Familiarity with best practices for creating content on Instagram
  - Ability to work independently and meet deadlines

You will need to able to be on site (near the ATL)



Hourly Range: $36.00-$100.00

item.title: Long Term - Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
-Editing and Enhancing: Crafting engaging and visually appealing videos, including highlight videos, podcast videos, and social media content with graphics, both in vertical and landscape orientations.

-Collaborative Work: Working closely with our production team to ensure seamless integration of your editing skills into our video production process.

-Montages and Highlight Videos: Creating captivating montages and highlight videos that sync perfectly with the rhythm and beat of the content.

-Communication: Attending regular virtual meetings via Zoom or Google to discuss project details, provide updates, and collaborate with team members.

Qualifications:

To excel in this role, you should have:

-Proficiency in Adobe Premiere Pro and After Effects.
-Strong English language skills (fluent in speaking and writing).
-A portfolio showcasing your previous video editing work, with an emphasis on montages and highlight videos.
-Experience working in both vertical and landscape video formats.
-The ability to work independently and as an integrated part of a creative team.
-Excellent communication skills, as remote collaboration and participation in meetings are crucial.

Hourly Range: $15.00-$20.00
Posted On: June 25, 2024 00:33 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Demo Video, Promotional Video, Real Estate Video, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Commercial, Audio Editing, Video Post-Editing, Motion Graphics
Skills: Demo Video, Promotional Video, Real Estate Video, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Commercial, Audio Editing, Video Post-Editing, Motion Graphics

item.title: Youtube Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
We are a dynamic content creation team dedicated to producing engaging and authentic vlog content for our rapidly growing YouTube channel. We focus on sharing stories that connect with our audience, covering a wide range of topics from daily life and adventures to special events and personal insights.

Job Description: We are seeking a creative and skilled Video Editor to join our team. This role requires a high level of creativity and an excellent understanding of storytelling through visual media. The ideal candidate will be responsible for editing and assembling recorded raw material into a suitable, finished product ready for broadcasting on YouTube. The material may include camera footage, dialogue, sound effects, graphics, and special effects.

Responsibilities:

Edit film footage using modern editing techniques.
Implement creative ideas to enhance the visual storytelling of vlogs.
Manage graphics, titles, music, and additional video elements to create a cohesive and engaging narrative.
Collaborate with the content creation team to understand and align with the vision of each project.
Maintain continuity while moving shots according to scene value.
Trim footage segments and put together the sequence of the vlog.
Input music, dialogues, graphics, and effects.
Ensure logical sequencing and smooth running of the final product.
Continuously discover and implement new editing technologies and industry best practices to maximize efficiency.
Monthly Deliverables:

Deliver four edited YouTube videos each month, to be published weekly.
All footage will be provided upfront each month, allowing the editor to time batch their work effectively and efficiently.
Qualifications:

Proven experience as a video editor with a strong portfolio.
Solid experience with digital technology and editing software packages (e.g., Premiere, After Effects, Final Cut).
Demonstrable video editing ability with a strong portfolio.
Thorough knowledge of timing, motivation, and continuity.
Familiarity with special effects, 3D, and compositing.
Creative mind and storytelling skills.
Requirements:

Ability to deliver high-quality work under tight deadlines.
Excellent communication skills to receive and understand directions.
Highly organized and detail-oriented.
Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
Experience in creating video content for social media, particularly YouTube.
What We Offer:

A creative and collaborative work environment.
Opportunities for professional growth and development.
Flexible working hours.


Posted On: June 25, 2024 00:15 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Intro & Outro, Music Video, Explainer Video, Video Production, Audio Editing, Animation, Videography, Visual Effects, Graphic Design, Motion Graphics, Video Post-Editing, Video Editing
Skills: Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Intro & Outro, Music Video, Explainer Video, Video Production, Audio Editing, Animation, Videography, Visual Effects, Graphic Design, Motion Graphics, Video Post-Editing, Video Editing
Country: United States

item.title: Long Form YouTube Video Editor | Skateboarding, Vlog Style Content - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for someone who is an expert at editing YouTube videos. These videos are for a professional skateboarder, so experience and knowledge in the skate/surf/snow industry is a plus. The ideal candidate loves to surf or skate and understands the community and culture.

We are looking for someone who understands YouTube. Someone who understands the fundamentals, i.e. storytelling, sound design and retention editing.

We are looking for someone who is committed to helping us create amazing projects, and who can help with future projects as well.

This can become a long-term job if it is a good fit.

These are the types of videos we are looking to create:
https://youtu.be/TyhXSj2jevk?si=W1nzvNRZkpE5yeMi
https://youtu.be/A5CP9BDk7fw?si=YeggLAWFEUJe9Ubd
https://youtu.be/CBEFcW7waWs?si=mSVufebuCyWSsbXB


To apply you need to do the following:
1. Send your portfolio with your best work.
2. Explain why we should hire you over everyone else.
3. Do you have a background with surf/slate culture? If so, who are some of your favorite creators or athletes?

item.title: Fitness Editing - eye catching exercise/movement tutorials - Upwork
item.description:
I'm a fitness coach and content creator in need of some expertise in the field of 3d rendering and layering, motion graphics, etc., specifically with anatomical layers for exercise demonstrations. I've linked a video below that is similar to what I'd like to achieve in my edits. I've spoken to some people who have noted how complicated this is, but I know the content creator who makes these uses CapCut and other similar apps. I personally use Final Cut or CapCut for most of my projects, so being able to pair with that one of those programs is preferred. Let me know what you think as this is out of my wheelhouse, but I'd like to incorporate this standard in my edits. Willing to negotiate prices!

Thanks in advance

https://www.youtube.com/shorts/g3T7LsEeDWQ

https://www.youtube.com/@DavisDiley

Hourly Range: $25.00-$50.00
Posted On: June 24, 2024 23:47 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Color Grading, Dynamic Transition, Visual Effects, CapCut, Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Final Cut Pro, Anatomy, 3D Animation, 3D Rendering, Motion Graphics

I'm looking for a video editor for my youtube cash cow channel, historical documentary channel.
must have these criteria :)


-from 3$ to 7$ per minute (always negotiable and depends on the quality of the editing)
-length of video over 1 hour
-example of the style of editing I need in my videos and channel:
°https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MpcgXTnd_74
°https://www.youtube.com/@this_is_history/videos
°https://www.youtube.com/@MadeInHistory
°https://www.youtube.com/@BeginningToNoww


-Use animated maps, animations, AI image creation, videos from films and other documentaries (know YouTube's copyright rules). Know how to use the right background music and audio effects.


I like to see samples of work you've done before!
Are you ok whit the price from description? ( if not dont apply)
Did you have a samples? (if not dont apply)
Do you have 90% job succes? (if not dont apply)

item.title: Video Content Creator - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented and creative Video Content Creator to join our team. As a Video Content Creator, you will be responsible for producing engaging and high-quality videos for our social media platforms and website. You will work closely with our marketing team to understand the requirements and develop video concepts that align with our brand identity. The ideal candidate has a strong understanding of current video trends, excellent storytelling skills, and proficiency in video editing software.

    Responsibilities:
    - Create compelling and visually appealing videos for various platforms
    - Collaborate with the marketing team to develop video concepts
    - Edit videos to ensure they meet the brand guidelines and quality standards
    - Stay up-to-date with the latest video trends and techniques

    Skills:
    - Proficient in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
    - Strong storytelling and narrative skills
    - Ability to translate ideas into engaging visual content
    - Knowledge of video optimization techniques for different platforms

    This is a medium-sized project with an expected duration of 1 to 3 months. We are looking for an intermediate-level Video Content Creator who can bring creativity and innovation to our video content strategy.


Posted On: June 24, 2024 23:15 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Videography, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Videography, Adobe Premiere Pro
Country: United States
click to apply
